wikitext.*:
[[Image:Sophisticated Games logo.png|Company logo|thumb|92x92px]]

'''Sophisticated Games''' is an international board game publisher. It specializes in the development and packaging of all book-based [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] games under license from [[Middle-earth Enterprises]]. Sophisticated Games is based in [[Cambridge]], [[United Kingdom]].

==Products==

*''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's Lord of the Rings]]''
*''[[Lord of the Rings (board game)|Lord of the Rings]]''
**''[[Lord of the Rings: The Friends and Foes]]'' (expansion)
**''[[Lord of the Rings: Sauron]]'' (expansion)
*''[[Lord of the Rings Trivia Game]]''
*''[[Lord of the Rings: The Duel (board game)|Lord of the Rings: The Duel]]''
*''[[Lord of the Rings: The Search]]''
*''[[Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation]]''
*''[[The Hobbit: The Defeat of the Evil Dragon Smaug]]''
*''[[War of the Ring (2004 board game)|War of the Ring]]''
*''[[Middle-earth Quest (board game)|Middle-earth Quest]]''
